bannerContent: Discover the power of seamless crypto trading with real-time insights and secure transactions. Start building your future today
introTitle: Trade Forex, Commodities, Indices, Shares and More
introContent: You can explore the world's hottest financial markets. StratTrade offers 0 commissions, extremely advantageous low spreads, and flexible leverage configurations.
friendlyContent: Simple and intuitive interface for easy operation
Risk management tools such as stop loss/trailing stop
Multiple technical charts and financial calendars, real-time news
Continuous improvement for a better trading experience
trustedContent: We are committed to providing a safe and responsible trading environment for our customers.

trustedInfoOne.title: Regulated by an authoritative body
trustedInfoOne.content: Industry authority regulation and authorization, win the trust of global customers

trustedInfoOne.title: Protecting the security of funds
trustedInfoOne.content: Retail customer deposits are segregated in trust accounts on an as-needed basis in accordance with regulatory requirements

trustedInfoTwo.title: Negative balance protection
trustedInfoTwo.content: Provide you with account negative balance protection, negative balance in a timely manner to clear the zero, so that your loss does not exceed the amount of entry, peace of mind trading

trustedInfoTwo.title: 5*24 hours customer service
trustedInfoTwo.content: Sincere and professional customer service team, 24 hours online support, happy to solve any problem you have!

shapingCrypto: Shaping the Crypto Options Industry. Since 2016.

shapingCryptoInfo.title: For Beginners
shapingCryptoInfo.content: Kick-start your trading skills with our free options course. Experiment on our Test Platform without any risk. Make use of our 24/7 Support for any questions. Your derivatives journey starts here.

shapingCryptoInfo.title: Experienced Traders
shapingCryptoInfo.content: Immerse yourself in our institutional-grade trading environment. Use the most advanced tools in the industry at the most liquid options market in the world.

shapingCryptoInfo.title: For Institutions
shapingCryptoInfo.content: Experience why the most prominent institutions have preferred StratTrade since 2016. Colo Services in LD4, Portfolio Margin Model, Block Trades, Combos, the best liquidity, Multicast, and more

moreServiceInfo.title: Risk management

easy&ConvenientTitle: Easy and convenient to open an account
